entry.title: Kaggle Competitions
entry.summary:
0 准备

新手一般选101类，有教程，可自行跟着教程过一遍

本次以《Titanic: Machine Learning from Disaster》为例，给出的数据总共有以下几个维度：

  • PassengerId：乘客ID
  • ​Pclass：乘客等级，first class (1), second class (2), third class (3)
  • Name：乘客名
  • Sex：性别
  • Age：年龄
  • SibSp：同船兄弟姐妹和配偶人数
  • Parch：同船父母和儿女人数
  • Ticket：船票ID
  • Fare：票价
  • Cabin：船舱
  • Embarked：搭乘站点
  • Survived：是否存活，1/0

1 训练数据预处理

主要看数据是否有缺失，哪些Feature需要转换为数值型等等。

# 读取训练数据
titanic = pandas.read_csv("titanic_train.csv")
# 观察数据
print(titanic.head(5))
print(titanic.describe())
# 缺失数据用均值填充
titanic["Age"] = titanic["Age"].fillna(titanic["Age"].median())
# 标称型数据转化为数值型数据
titanic.loc[titanic["Sex"] == "male", "Sex"] = 0
titanic.loc[titanic["Sex"] == "female", "Sex"] = 1
# 手工填充缺失数据并转化为数值型
print(titanic["Embarked"].unique())
# The most common embarkation port is S, so let's assume everyone got on there.
titanic["Embarked"] = titanic["Embarked"].fillna("S")
titanic.loc[titanic["Embarked"] == "S", "Embarked"] = 0
titanic.loc[titanic["Embarked"] == "C", "Embarked"] = 1
titanic.loc[titanic["Embarked"] == "Q", "Embarked"] = 2

2 选取合适算法进行交叉验证

交叉验证是为了避免过度拟合。将训练数据分为n份（假设n=3），n0为测试数据，n1、n2为训练数据，预测accuracy，再以n1为测试数据，以此类推，最后评估总体accuracy。

2.1 LinearRegression

from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from sklearn.cross_validation import KFold
import numpy as np
# 选取合适Feature
predictors = ["Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "SibSp", "Parch", "Fare", "Embarked"]
# 初始化LinearRegressio
alg = LinearRegression()
# 将训练数据分为3份，进行交叉验证
kf = KFold(titanic.shape[0], n_folds=3, random_state=1)
predictions = []
# 交叉验证
for train, test in kf:
        # 初始化训练数据预测集
    train_predictors = (titanic[predictors].iloc[train,:])
    # 初始化训练数据结果集
    train_target = titanic["Survived"].iloc[train]
    # 训练数据预测集与结果集一一对应
    alg.fit(train_predictors, train_target)
    # 根据训练数据对测试数据进行预测
    test_predictions = alg.predict(titanic[predictors].iloc[test,:])
    # 合并至预测结果["Survived"]
    predictions.append(test_predictions)
# 将3份预测结果合并为一份
predictions = np.concatenate(predictions, axis=0)
# 评估总体准确率
predictions[predictions > .5] = 1
predictions[predictions <=.5] = 0
accuracy = sum(predictions[predictions == titanic["Survived"]]) / len(predictions)

2.2 Logistic regression

from sklearn import cross_validation
# 初始化LogisticRegression
alg = LogisticRegression(random_state=1)
# 交叉验证
accuracy = cross_validation.cross_val_score(alg, titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"], cv=3)
# 求平均准确率（accuracy有3份）
print(accuracy.mean())

3 提高预测准确率

包括3点：选取更为合适的算法、找到更合适的Feature、集成算法。

3.1 Random Forest

from sklearn import cross_validation
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
predictors = ["Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "SibSp", "Parch", "Fare", "Embarked"]
alg = RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1, n_estimators=10, min_samples_split=2, min_samples_leaf=1)
accuracy = cross_validation.cross_val_score(alg, titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"], cv=3)
print(accuracy.mean())
# accuracy = 0.800224466891

可以通过调整参数减少过度拟合。

alg = RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1, n_estimators=150, min_samples_split=4, min_samples_leaf=2)
accuracy = cross_validation.cross_val_score(alg, titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"], cv=3)
print(accuracy.mean())
# accuracy = 0.819304152637

3.2 发掘新的Feature

可以通过截取Name字段中乘客的first name，来分析乘客的身份地位，进而预测乘客的生还几率。

import re
# 截取first name
def get_title(name):
    title_search = re.search(' ([A-Za-z]+)\.', name)
    if title_search:
        return title_search.group(1)
    return ""
titles = titanic["Name"].apply(get_title)
# 分析titles中有多少类
print(pandas.value_counts(titles))
# 为title定义数值标识
title_mapping = {"Mr": 1, "Miss": 2, "Mrs": 3, "Master": 4, "Dr": 5, "Rev": 6, "Major": 7, "Col": 7, "Mlle": 8, "Mme": 8, "Don": 9, "Lady": 10, "Countess": 10, "Jonkheer": 10, "Sir": 9, "Capt": 7, "Ms": 2}
for k,v in title_mapping.items():
    titles[titles == k] = v
print(pandas.value_counts(titles))
titanic["Title"] = titles

3.3 寻找合适的Feature

通过sklearn包中SelectKBest函数，分析每个Feature与结果的相关性，进而选取合适的Feature。

import numpy as np
from sklearn.feature_selection import SelectKBest, f_classif
predictors = ["Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "SibSp", "Parch", "Fare", "Embarked", "FamilySize", "Title", "FamilyId"]
# SelectKBest函数：初始化selector
selector = SelectKBest(f_classif, k=5)
selector.fit(titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"])
scores = -np.log10(selector.pvalues_)
# 各Features的scores可视化
plt.bar(range(len(predictors)), scores)
plt.xticks(range(len(predictors)), predictors, rotation='vertical')
plt.show()
# 选取合适的features
predictors = ["Pclass", "Sex", "Fare", "Title"]
alg = RandomForestClassifier(random_state=1, n_estimators=150, min_samples_split=8, min_samples_leaf=4)
accuracy = cross_validation.cross_val_score(alg, titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"], cv=3)
print(accuracy.mean())
# accuracy = 0.811447811448

3.4 集成算法（Ensembling）

多样化的分类算法通常会比单一算法效果更佳。但是有两点需要注意： 1）集成的算法不能类似，如逻辑回归和线性回归； 2）算法必须在同一精度下。 这里以Gradient Boosting（GB）和logistic regression（LR）集成为例：

from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier
import numpy as np
# ensemble algorithms
algorithms = [
    [GradientBoostingClassifier(random_state=1, n_estimators=25, max_depth=3), ["Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "Fare", "Embarked", "FamilySize", "Title", "FamilyId"]],
    [LogisticRegression(random_state=1), ["Pclass", "Sex", "Fare", "FamilySize", "Title", "Age", "Embarked"]]
]
# 初始化cross validation folds
kf = KFold(titanic.shape[0], n_folds=3, random_state=1)
predictions = []
for train, test in kf:
    train_target = titanic["Survived"].iloc[train]
    full_test_predictions = []
    for alg, predictors in algorithms:
        alg.fit(titanic[predictors].iloc[train,:], train_target)
        # The .astype(float) is necessary to convert the dataframe to all floats and avoid an sklearn error.
        test_predictions = alg.predict_proba(titanic[predictors].iloc[test,:].astype(float))[:,1]
        full_test_predictions.append(test_predictions)
    test_predictions = (full_test_predictions[0] + full_test_predictions[1]) / 2
    test_predictions[test_predictions <= .5] = 0
    test_predictions[test_predictions > .5] = 1
    predictions.append(test_predictions)
predictions = np.concatenate(predictions, axis=0)
accuracy = sum(predictions[predictions == titanic["Survived"]]) / len(predictions)
print(accuracy)
# accuracy = 0.819304152637
# 测试数据添加新Feature：Title,FamilySize,FamilyId
titles = titanic_test["Name"].apply(get_title)
title_mapping = {"Mr": 1, "Miss": 2, "Mrs": 3, "Master": 4, "Dr": 5, "Rev": 6, "Major": 7, "Col": 7, "Mlle": 8, "Mme": 8, "Don": 9, "Lady": 10, "Countess": 10, "Jonkheer": 10, "Sir": 9, "Capt": 7, "Ms": 2, "Dona": 10}
for k,v in title_mapping.items():
    titles[titles == k] = v
titanic_test["Title"] = titles
print(pandas.value_counts(titanic_test["Title"]))
titanic_test["FamilySize"] = titanic_test["SibSp"] + titanic_test["Parch"]
print(family_id_mapping)
family_ids = titanic_test.apply(get_family_id, axis=1)
family_ids[titanic_test["FamilySize"] < 3] = -1
titanic_test["FamilyId"] = family_ids
titanic_test["NameLength"] = titanic_test["Name"].apply(lambda x: len(x))
predictors = ["Pclass", "Sex", "Age", "Fare", "Embarked", "FamilySize", "Title", "FamilyId"]
algorithms = [
    [GradientBoostingClassifier(random_state=1, n_estimators=25, max_depth=3), predictors],
    [LogisticRegression(random_state=1), ["Pclass", "Sex", "Fare", "FamilySize", "Title", "Age", "Embarked"]]
]
full_predictions = []
for alg, predictors in algorithms:
    alg.fit(titanic[predictors], titanic["Survived"])
    predictions = alg.predict_proba(titanic_test[predictors].astype(float))[:,1]
    full_predictions.append(predictions)
# 由于GB预测准确率较高，所以权重较大
predictions = (full_predictions[0] * 3 + full_predictions[1]) / 4
predictions[predictions <= .5] = 0
predictions[predictions > .5] = 1
predictions = predictions.astype(int)
submission = pandas.DataFrame({
        "PassengerId": titanic_test["PassengerId"],
        "Survived": predictions
    })

4 不断优化

通过第三点提到的方法（选取更为合适的算法、找到更合适的Feature、集成算法），再进一步优化，提高accuracy，比如：尝试加入random forest到ensemble algorithm中；尝试支持向量机、神经网络；调整各算法的比重；尝试从已有字段再截取可用的相关信息；等等。

entry.title: 2016年——新的开始
entry.summary:
觉得自己真是老了，花了4个晚上，终于勉强把个人博客给搭起来了，也算是给自己2016年一个新的开始吧。 2015年，总的来说还是有所收获的。

  • 2月份借调去了市场部学做人，也坚定了自己跳槽的决心
  • 3月份误入股市，至今深套，花钱买教训
  • 4月份去了北京，苏州出差，也当做是去散散心吧
  • 5月份去深圳见了Hoan男神，但是可惜隔天要上班，没办法亲身体验男神的solo，到现在都追悔莫及
  • 6月份迎来了女朋友的回归
  • 7月份开始健身，重拾数据学习之路
  • 8月份和女朋友回了趟家，妈还是那么唠叨，爸有点显老了，健康就好
  • 国庆跟女朋友回了奉节体验山山水水，还作为游客上了当地电视台，有点小开心
  • 10月份意外有机会回母校当公司宣讲会嘉宾，上去搞笑了一把
  • 11月份跟女朋友一起去开平庆祝4周年
  • 12月份，发了年终奖......

新的一年，关了朋友圈，删了炉石，早早地列下年度目标，希望今年能一一实现。
